study_activities.name: Flashcards
study_activities.description: Practice vocabulary with digital flashcards. Flip through cards to test your knowledge of Italian words and their English translations.

study_activities.name: Word Matching
study_activities.description: Match Italian words with their English translations. Drag and drop pairs to improve your vocabulary recognition.

study_activities.name: Spelling Practice
study_activities.description: Practice spelling Italian words correctly. Type the Italian translation of English words to improve your writing skills.

study_activities.name: Vocabulary Quiz
study_activities.description: Test your knowledge with multiple choice questions. Select the correct translation from four options.

study_activities.name: Word Builder
study_activities.description: Build Italian words by arranging letters in the correct order. Great for learning word structure and spelling.
